amendment.description: Amendment adds Association Health Plans to the Employee Retirement Income Security Act (ERISA) and removes restrictions on Medical Savings Accounts (MSAs).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 107-184 to add Association Health Plans to the bill and strikes section 511 (Limitations on Number of Medical Savings Accounts(MSA's)), replacing it with fully expanded MSA's.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thomas amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 194 (Roll no. 328).
